{"id":1097620700,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 month, 2 weeks","timestamp":1699847836,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"44 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1097620700/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Sort Vowels in a String","memory":"12.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string sortVowels(string s) {\n        vector<char> v;\n        for(auto c : s){\n            if(c == 'a' || c == 'e' || c == 'i' || c == 'o' || c == 'u' || c == 'A' || c == 'E' || c == 'I' || c == 'O' || c == 'U'){\n                v.push_back(c);\n            }\n        }\n\n        sort(v.begin(), v.end());\n        int j = 0;\n\n        for(int i=0;i<s.length();i++){\n            if(s[i] == 'a' || s[i] == 'e' || s[i] == 'i' || s[i] == 'o' || s[i] == 'u' || s[i] == 'A' || s[i] == 'E' || s[i] == 'I' || s[i] == 'O' || s[i] == 'U'){\n                s[i] = v[j];\n                j++;\n                \n            }\n\n        }\n\n\n        cout << s;\n        return s;\n        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"sort-vowels-in-a-string","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
